title: Ep. 74 - A Court of Mist and Fury by Sarah J. Maas (PART 1)
itunes:title: A Court of Mist and Fury by Sarah J. Maas (PART 1)
description:
Hey HB's!! IT'S TIME! We're finally talking about  A Court of Mist and Fury by Sarah J. Maas! It's book 2 of her Court of Thorns and Roses Series. We've got Feyre out from under the mountain and engaged to that dumb dummy Tamlin, but not for long! Then it's all night court all the time. 
 SKIPPERS! Skip to 20:35 if you want to get straight to the book. You're gonna miss out on Ripped Bodice, though. 
 Bonus Content: Blood sharing, new names for book 1, Erin's Pilgrimage to The Ripped Bodice, Sexy Night King sexiness, "Schmerger," Spring Court: The Taint of Fairyland, Erin still refuses to learn or remember names, #feministfaeisbae, *Bing Boong Bong* Tamlin's Not that Bad with Erin, *Bing Boong Bong* Tamlin is a Big Dumb Dummy with Melody, Water Wraith Drummer Boys, and the best, most delicious Brownie Batter metaphor you've ever heard. YUM. 
 Self Love Recommendations:   Erin: The Magicians Season 4 and Little Italy, a terribly wonderful movie on Amazon Prime
 Melody: Big Mouth Season 2 and "We're all a little broken, that's how the light gets in"
 Episode Sponsor: 
 https://www.bubblesandbooks.com/ (Bubbles and Books!)
 Use the offer code HEAVINGBOSOMS10 to get 10% off your first order!
 Facebook group, home of the monthly "Bubbles Night" 
 Instagram
 Pintrest
 https://twitter.com/soakedromance (Twitter)
 Patreon Shout Out! 
 Blair B., you are a Basilisk. You are a great serpent queen with a deadly glare, turning lesser beings to stone with just one glance. Leaving deadly venom in your wake for all those deserving of your ire, you are one badass lady. According to our online research, you only have two weaknesses: the odor of weasels (weird, right?) and preteen Gryffindors, so watch out for that. Otherwise, you are pretty much the queen of everything.
Mentioned in this episode:
Preorder Naima Simone X Friends Book Boyfriend Box!!
This box has EVERYTHING you could ever want in a book boyfriend from Tessa Bailey, Avery Flynn, Farrah Rochon, Jayci Lee, Kennedy Ryan, Adriana Herrera, and Naima Simone.
You can look forward to paperbacks, signed book plates, limited edition book boyfriend mugs, the book boyfriend pajamas/loungewear, bookmarks and more!
Tiers include:
- Cinnamon Roll - $114.99
- The Alpha - - $169.99 
Enter the promo code BONKERS10 at checkout to receive $10 off!!! 
ONLY AVAILABLE UNTIL OCT 10, 2022!
If you have any questions, email orders@honeymagnolia.co.
https://heaving-bosoms.captivate.fm/nsbookboyfriends (Naima's Book Boyfriends)

Hey HB's!! IT'S TIME! We're finally talking about A Court of Mist and Fury by Sarah J. Maas! It's book 2 of her Court of Thorns and Roses Series. We've got Feyre out from under the mountain and engaged to that dumb dummy Tamlin, but not for long! Then it's all night court all the time. 

SKIPPERS! Skip to 20:35 if you want to get straight to the book. You're gonna miss out on Ripped Bodice, though. 

Bonus Content: Blood sharing, new names for book 1, Erin's Pilgrimage to The Ripped Bodice, Sexy Night King sexiness, "Schmerger," Spring Court: The Taint of Fairyland, Erin still refuses to learn or remember names, #feministfaeisbae, *Bing Boong Bong* Tamlin's Not that Bad with Erin, *Bing Boong Bong* Tamlin is a Big Dumb Dummy with Melody, Water Wraith Drummer Boys, and the best, most delicious Brownie Batter metaphor you've ever heard. According to our online research, you only have two weaknesses: the odor of weasels (weird, right?) and preteen Gryffindors, so watch out for that. Otherwise, you are pretty much the queen of everything.
